FuncDef: This command associates an AA transit policy to the service. The transit IP policy must be defined prior to associating the policy with a SAP in theconfig>application-assurance>group>policy>transit-ip-policycontext.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an integer identifying an IP transit IP profile entry. Values-1 to 65535.
Specifies an integer identifying a prefix transit profile entry. Values-1 to 65535.
